name: Cybernetic Eye, Telescopic (TL-12)
description:
Telescopic vision allows magnification similar to telescopic binoculars, with zoom controlled by eyeball pressure (which is manipulated by squinting). This version of the cybernetic eye is single-function eye and looks more like a natural, unaltered eye.

In all cases, the cyber eye includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
